tool_description: Extracts and returns detailed metadata for journal entries including creation details, statistics, and classifications.

entry_ids.description: List of entry IDs to get metadata for

include_word_stats.description: Whether to include word count and reading time statistics

include_sentiment.description: Whether to include sentiment analysis results

error_messages: Invalid entry IDs: Some entry IDs do not exist or are malformed
Too many entries: Maximum 100 entries can be processed at once
Metadata extraction failed: Some entries may be corrupted or inaccessible
usage: Provide entry_ids and configure metadata options to get comprehensive information about journal entries.

entry_dates.description: Creation dates for each entry in date-time format

reading_times.description: Estimated reading time in minutes for each entry

sentiment_scores.description: Sentiment scores (-1 to 1, negative to positive) for each entry

has_user_tags.description: Whether each entry has user-defined tags

metadata_count.description: Number of entries with successfully extracted metadata
